Interviewer - New York, NY - Full-time - Founding Engineers - https://getinterviewer.com

Interviewer automates first-round screening interviews with an AI voice agent. We're well-funded, deployed with multiple customers and are already hitting non-trivial scaling challenges.

We're looking for founding engineers who have strong intuitions on implementing strong reliability, low-latency systems as well as realtime observability systems to go along with it. ML experience is a plus but the focus is on full-stack software engineering right now.

We pay above market, have all the healthcare benefits you could want and are in-person at our office in lower Manhattan.

Send an email to shreyas@techinterviewer.ai (me, the CTO) if you're interested!
